This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled "Explore your accessibility options".

City News

  1. Frontier Waste Trash Collection Update Due to Weather

    Due to recent weather delays, Frontier Waste Solutions will collect household trash only this week. Bulk, brush, and recycling services are suspended, and routes are expected to be completed by Saturday. Read on... about Frontier Waste Trash Collection Update Due to Weather

  1. City of Watauga Facilities Closed and Civil Service Meeting Canceled Tuesday, January 27

    Winter Weather Update City facilities were scheduled to open at noon today, Jan. 27. Due to continued unsafe road conditions, City facilities will remain closed today to ensure the safety of our staff and residents. Civil Service meeting is also canceled. Read on... about City of Watauga Facilities Closed and Civil Service Meeting Canceled Tuesday, January 27

  2. Teen Fiber Arts Social Club

    Hey teens! Bring a project so you can crochet, knit, sew, embroider, or cross-stitch with friends at the library! Please note: This is a social club, so there is no guarantee that someone in attendance can teach you.
